name: Cool and Creamy Cucumber Salad
author: KatieSkell01
summary: A cool side dish perfect for hot summer days, using sweet bell peppers instead of onions for those like me who don't care for onions!
ingredients: 2  green bell peppers, cut into thin matchsticks
½ cup chopped fresh dill, or more to taste
directions: Place cucumbers and bell peppers into a colander and allow liquid to drain for 4 hours
While vegetables are draining, place yogurt into a separate colander lined with paper towels and let stand for 4 hours to allow excess whey to drain from the yogurt
Combine cucumbers, bell peppers, thickened yogurt, sour cream, vinegar, dill, salt, and black pepper in a large salad bowl; chill before serving
